fields.name: Sea Breeze (Cost 60%/30%):
fields.value: Target a player. Their Defense Score is doubled for the Night.

fields.name: Call of the Deep (Cost 45%/15%):
fields.value: Target a player that is not yourself. At the end of the Night, their Attack Power and Defense Power each permanently increase by 0.2x.

fields.name: Depth Pressure (Cost 40%/20%):
fields.value: You may use this ability as many times as you wish during the Evening to learn the role of a player currently in a Hello Neighbor with a Mage-aligned player.
